description: Try our easy to follow Cheesy Mediterranean Pizzas recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Cheesy Mediterranean Pizzas Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.5 red capsicum, halved, deseeded, thinly sliced
0.5 small yellow capsicum, halved, deseeded, thinly sliced
0.25 cup mixed olives, pitted and halved

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 220°C/200°C fan-forced. Line 2 baking trays with baking paper. Place pizza bases on trays.
Spread sauce evenly over bases. Scatter over half the cheese. Divide ham, capsicums, onion and olives among bases. Scatter over remaining cheese.
Bake for 15 minutes or until cheese is golden and bases are crisp. Serve drizzled with pesto and topped with basil.
